analysis.key_quote: Can we not politicize the NIH please? The reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would do so IMO, and reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by expressing concerns about politicization of the NIH and its negative impact on public trust and scientific integrity.
